mapper.select: SELECT MID, MNICK, MLEVEL FROM MEMBER WHERE MID = #{MID} AND MPW = #{MPW} AND MSTATE = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCESSHISTORY(MID, AHDATE) VALUES(#{MID}, DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO MEMBER(MID, MPW, MNAME, MPHONE, MGENDER, MBIRTH, MLEVEL, MSTATE, MNICK, MDATE) VALUES(#{MID}, #{MPW}, #{MNAME}, #{MPHONE}, #{MGENDER}, #{MBIRTH}, #{MLEVEL}, 1, #{MNICK}, DEFAULT)
